document.full_text: meredith vieira marked her final appearance as a popular co-host of nbc's top-rated "today" show on wednesday with an emotional farewell, telling her fans: "i will never leave you."
document.title: vieira makes farewell appearance on "today" show
lines_and_colors: meredith vieira marked her final appearance as a popular co-host of nbc's top-rated "today" show on wednesday with an emotional farewell, telling her fans: "i will never leave you."
